Summary: Noticed a large flock of terns behaving erratically.
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed a large flock of terns behaving erratically. To the south noticed a slowly moving object near them. Two silver balls joined together. It continued moving slowly to the north east for about 10 minutes, then it was out of sight range.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Erie
There were no other sightings in Erie on or around August 29th 2013
